title: Synthesis of the Weyl matrix on the square lattice
authors: Dongjie Wu, ChuanFu Yang, Natalia Pavlovna Bondarenko
abstract:
A method for successive synthesis of the Weyl matrix on the square lattice is
proposed. It allows one to compute the Weyl matrix of a large graph by adding
new edges and solving elementary systems of linear algebraic equations at each
step. Synthesis of the Weyl matrix is useful to further study the inverse
problems of the square lattice. Moreover, our approach can be extended to other
types of periodic lattices.
